name: Cosmic Dream Tee
description: A t-shirt that's out of this world. Made from 100% premium cotton, this tee features a stunning cosmic print that is sure to turn heads. Perfect for dreamers and stargazers.

name: Urban Explorer Hoodie
description: Stay warm and stylish on your city adventures. This hoodie is crafted from a soft fleece blend and features a minimalist design with a modern fit. Your go-to for chilly evenings.

name: Retro Wave Sneakers
description: Step back in time with these 80s inspired sneakers. Combining classic style with modern comfort, they feature a cushioned sole and a vibrant color palette. Lace up and feel the nostalgia.

name: Minimalist Chrono Watch
description: Elegance in simplicity. This watch boasts a clean, minimalist face, a genuine leather strap, and precise chronograph movement. A timeless accessory for any occasion.

name: Nomad Tech Backpack
description: The ultimate backpack for the modern traveler. With dedicated compartments for your laptop and gadgets, durable water-resistant material, and an ergonomic design for comfort.

name: Performance Joggers
description: Engineered for movement. These joggers are made from a lightweight, stretchable fabric that wicks away moisture, keeping you comfortable whether you're at the gym or on the go.

name: Classic Denim Jacket
description: A wardrobe staple that never goes out of style. Our denim jacket is crafted from high-quality denim with a comfortable fit, perfect for layering over any outfit.

name: Vista Polarized Sunglasses
description: Protect your eyes with style. The Vista sunglasses feature polarized lenses to reduce glare and provide 100% UV protection, all in a sleek, modern frame.

name: Organic Cotton Beanie
description: Simple, soft, and sustainable. This beanie is made from 100% organic cotton for a comfortable, breathable fit that keeps you warm without overheating.

name: Aero-Light Windbreaker
description: Feather-light and ready for anything. This windbreaker is designed to pack down small and provide essential protection from wind and light rain. Ideal for runners and cyclists.

name: Everyday Leather Belt
description: The perfect finishing touch. Made from genuine full-grain leather, this belt is built to last and will develop a unique patina over time. A classic accessory for any wardrobe.

name: Breeze Linen Shirt
description: Stay cool and look sharp. This shirt is woven from 100% pure linen, making it exceptionally breathable and perfect for warm weather. Effortless style for any sunny day.
